description: Matt’s slave/chauffeur Jeff (Aaron Tanner) picks Rick up outside his bar and drives him to Matt’s large suburban home where, after the two masters have embraced and the slave has licked their boots, Matt offers Jeff to Rick for the night. Alone with Jeff in Matt’s dungeon, Rick takes charge, and has Jeff worship him from boots to ass to genitals to armpits. When satisfied, Rick orders Jeff to bring him some rope.
title: Masters & Slaves 1: Meeting Matt's Slave
